keyMoments.title: Flying Pirates Form Alliance with New Fish-Man Pirates
keyMoments.description: Captain Vander Decken IX forms an alliance with Hody Jones and the New Fish-Man Pirates to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: The Flying Pirates become part of the main antagonistic force threatening Fish-Man Island.

allies.description: Alliance formed to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom and Fish-Man Island

enemies.reason: Opposition to their plans and Luffy protecting Shirahoshi
Target of destruction in alliance with Hody Jones

ship.name: Unknown
ship.description: The Flying Pirates' ship details not revealed in this episode

keyMoments.title: Form Alliance with Flying Pirates
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones forms an alliance with Vander Decken IX and the Flying Pirates at Noah to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Strengthens the antagonistic force with the addition of Decken's Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Plot to Destroy Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates finalize their plan to overthrow King Neptune and destroy Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the main conflict of the Fish-Man Island Arc.

allies.description: Alliance formed to destroy the Ryugu Kingdom and Fish-Man Island

enemies.reason: Conflicting goals regarding Fish-Man Island's future
Revolutionary goal to overthrow the kingdom

ship.name: Unknown
ship.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates' ship details not fully revealed in this episode
